forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 38F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 53F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
